sections.heading: assessor, defined.County assessor includes an elected or appointed county assessor or a county clerk who is an ex officio county assessor
sections.text: SourceLaws 1987, LB 508, § 2;Laws 1990, LB 821, § 41;Laws 2000, LB 968, § 24;Laws 2003, LB 292, § 5;Laws 2008, LB965, § 2;Laws 2015, LB261, § 5.Cross ReferencesCo
